agenda.description: ** REVISION ** SENATE NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Agriculture TIME & DATE: 1:30 PM or upon adjournment Monday, March 25, 2019 PLACE: 2E.20 (Betty King Cmte. Rm.) CHAIR: Senator Bob Hall The Senate Committee on Agriculture will met to consider the the following. SB 776 Zaffirini Relating to the establishment of an agriculture and rural ombudsman office. SB 814 Seliger Relating to the performance of equine dentistry by students of equine dental provider certification programs. SB 1409 Hall Relating to the administration, implementation, and enforcement of federal produce safety standards by the Department of Agriculture. SB 2037 Hall Relating to a study regarding the feasibility of implementing a central filing system for the filing of financing statements for agricultural liens. ** See Committee Coordinator for previous versions of the schedule **
